name: The Glowing Orb
description:
A mysterious orb appears out at sea, on an island built by an ancient people. A young warrior discovers the orb and goes after it, though a menacing foe awaits...

move with: arrow keys or w,a,s,d.

attack with: x or j.

Hope you guys enjoy the game,you can follow me on Twitter, https://twitter.com/JuniKgabung.

The music was done by Eric Matyas at http://soundimage.org/.
